Actions.Name: Flapjack
Actions.Description: The cook summons a flapjack in range 4.

Summons.Name: Flapjack
Summons.SummonEffects: A character other than the [name] moving into the flapjack's space can pick it up, removing it. That character gains defiance. A character that already has defiance gains 6 vigor. A character with vigor becomes unstoppable until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Cook Up a Storm
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a burst 2 (self) terrain effect until the start of their next turn. Foes in the area are shoved until outside the of area when it is created. The area is dangerous terrain for foes, provides cover for allies, and allies in the area when it is created gain 3 vigor.
